user_query: I am planning a taekwondo-themed birthday party for my friend's child. Can you help me find businesses related to taekwondo in our area? Additionally, please provide me with the login details for the Capitall Fitness platform.

TaskList.description: Find taekwondo-related businesses in the user's area by querying local business listings.
Retrieve the login details for the Capitall Fitness platform by querying user account information.
